hero_text: At GMG, we guide international talent towards enriching learning and working experiences in Germany and beyond.

recruitment.title: Healthcare Recruitment
recruitment.description: We connect qualified healthcare professionals from Tunisia with opportunities in Germany. From visa management to integration, we handle every step to ensure a smooth transition.

students_placement.title: Student Support
students_placement.description: Study at renowned universities in Germany with our personalized support, covering program selection, administrative processes, and on-site integration.

professional_training.title: Professional Training
professional_training.description: Participate in specialized and professional training in Germany in fields like healthcare, engineering, and technology, and stand out in the job market.

language_school.title: Language School
language_school.description: Master German with courses tailored to your needs, whether you're a student or a professional. Our intensive B1 and B2 courses ensure optimal preparation.

features-home.description: GMG guides you every step of the way, ensuring fast, reliable, and personalized service.

data.desc: Thanks to GMG, I was able to pursue my studies at a prestigious university in Germany. Their support was exceptional.
data.name: Hiba Ben Youssef
data.title: Student, Berlin

data.desc: The recruitment process with GMG was smooth and efficient. I am now working as a nurse in Germany.
data.name: Ahmed Khemiri
data.title: Nurse, Frankfurt

data.desc: GMG has been a reliable partner in my transition to an international career. Their constant support made all the difference.
data.name: Noura Rahmani
data.title: Physiotherapist, Munich

question_one.title: How can I apply for a healthcare job?
question_one.description: We help you prepare your documents, apply, and manage administrative processes, including visas. Contact us to get started.

question_two.title: How do I enroll in a university in Germany?
question_two.description: We guide you in finding universities, submitting applications, and following up until admission. Our advisors are here to assist you.

question_three.title: What are the requirements for professional training in Germany?
question_three.description: You generally need a recognized diploma and a B1 or B2 level in German. We offer language courses to help you meet these criteria.

question_four.title: Do you offer German language courses?
question_four.description: Yes, we offer courses for all levels, tailored to the needs of students and professionals.

question_five.title: How can I get help with my application?
question_five.description: Our team is available to answer your questions. Contact us via email or our online form.

features.title: Achieve Your Educational and Professional Dreams
features.sm_desc_1: At GMG, we open doors to international opportunities for students and professionals.
features.sm_desc_2: Our services simplify the process, allowing you to focus on success.
features.project_desc: A clear strategy to achieve your goals.
features.ideation_desc: Turning your ideas into concrete results.
features.design_desc: Assistance customized to your specific needs.

about.title: About GMG
about.right_text_1: GMG is dedicated to connecting international talent with education and career opportunities. Our goal is to make transitions simple and accessible.
about.right_text_2: We provide personalized support at every step, ensuring successful and sustainable integration.
about.desc: With GMG, I successfully transitioned to Germany. Their team handled every step, making the experience stress-free.

tunisia_office.heading: GMG Office Tunisia
tunisia_office.description: Our office in Tunis is your starting point for a career or studies abroad.
tunisia_office.card_hours: Open Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM

international_offices.heading: International Offices
international_offices.description: With offices in Germany, Saudi Arabia, and Colombia, we offer global support to help you achieve your goals.

colombia.card_hours: Open Monday to Friday, 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM

germany.card_hours: Open Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM

saudi_arabia.card_hours: Open Sunday to Thursday, 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM

footer.subscribe_text: Sign up for our newsletter to receive updates about our services.
footer.widget_desc: A new way to make payments easy, reliable, and 100% secure.
